% Latent Diriclet allocation model


\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{bayesnet}

\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[x=3.7cm,y=3.7cm]

\node[latent] (A) [minimum size=2cm] {$A$};
\node[latent] (B) [above right=of A, minimum size=2cm] {$B$};
\node[latent] (D) [below right=of B, minimum size=2cm] {$C$};
\node[latent] (C) [below right=of D, minimum size=2cm] {$D$};
\node[latent] (E) [below=of C, minimum size=2cm] {$E$};

\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
%\endpgfgraphicnamed
